txt.en: You have left the race area

'Here for the festival, are you? Well, as you may know, our main event is the Keg-hopping Race!

'This contest shall pit four drunken sots... that is to say, fine and upstanding dwarves in a fight to the finish!

'The finish line, that is! We don't let those fellows anywhere near axes or other sharp implements until they've had a chance to sleep it off.  Pick a likely looking contestant and let's see if you've got an eye to spot the winner!'
The Keg-hopping Race is in full swing! Arnar is accepting wagers on which dwarf is most likely to win.
Speak to Arnar to choose a race contestant
Observe the race and cheer for your chosen participant.
Speak to Arnar and choose your favourite contestant for the next upcoming race.
Wait for the race to begin
Watch the race to see if your contestant will win
Do not leave the race area
